queries.query_name: EC2 Instance Has No IAM Role
queries.description: Check if an EC2 instance refers to an IAM profile, which represents an IAM Role.

To avoid opening all ports for Allow rules, EC2 NetworkACL Entry Protocol should be either 6 (for TCP), 17 (for UDP), 1 (for ICMP), or 58 (for ICMPv6, which must include an IPv6 CIDR block, ICMP type, and code).

files.expected_value: 'Resources.InboundHTTPPublicNetworkAclEntry.Properties.Protocol' should be either 6 (for TCP), 17 (for UDP), 1 (for ICMP), or 58 (for ICMPv6, which must include an IPv6 CIDR block, ICMP type, and code)
files.actual_value: 'Resources.InboundHTTPPublicNetworkAclEntry.Properties.Protocol' is configured with a protocol different than 6 (for TCP), 17 (for UDP), 1 (for ICMP), or 58 (for ICMPv6, which must include an IPv6 CIDR block, ICMP type, and code)

files.expected_value: 'Resources.OutboundPublicNetworkAclEntry.Properties.Protocol' should be either 6 (for TCP), 17 (for UDP), 1 (for ICMP), or 58 (for ICMPv6, which must include an IPv6 CIDR block, ICMP type, and code)
files.actual_value: 'Resources.OutboundPublicNetworkAclEntry.Properties.Protocol' is configured with a protocol different than 6 (for TCP), 17 (for UDP), 1 (for ICMP), or 58 (for ICMPv6, which must include an IPv6 CIDR block, ICMP type, and code)
